attributes.action: GIVE THE GURKIRAS WHAT THEY DESERVE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I AS OLD SOLDIER,THAT YOU AND YOUR GOVERMENT ARE GIVING THIS MEN WHAT THEY DESERVE.LETS NOT FORGET IF IT WAS NOT FOR THERE HALP MENY OF USE WOULD NOT BE HERE.I FEEL SO STRONGLY ABOUT THIS I AM CONCIDERING RETUNING MY GSM. I REMAIN SIR YOUR OBDIANT SERVANT.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
